Name: Mistake
About the game: According to scientists, the probability of an onboard computer error is only 0.0001%, but we had to be the ones to get that lucky ticket! This is a dynamic action game with unstoppable shooting against superior enemy units and a limited movement area. The game is done in three-dimensional with low-polygonal models that add charm and create a unique style. From a bird's eye view, we follow the adventures of astronauts who find themselves on the Earth of the not-too-distant future, which has survived the post-apocalypse. Solve the mystery of the crystals and break down the wall of misunderstanding!
